member.name: T:JordiAragon.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Interfaces.IDomainEvent
member.summary: The Event occurs within the problem domain (living inside a bounded context) and is used to communicate a change in the state of the entity. This is a private event part of Ubiquitous Language.

member.name: T:JordiAragon.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Interfaces.IDomainEventNotification`1
member.summary: The Domain Event Notification is an event that occurs within the problem domain (living inside a bounded context) and is used to communicate a change in the state of the entity or aggregate. This is a private event, persisted, part of Ubiquitous Language.

member.name: T:JordiAragon.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Interfaces.IEntity`1
member.summary: Generic abstraction for a domain entity.

member.name: T:JordiAragon.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Interfaces.ISoftDelete
member.summary: It indicates whether is logically deleted.
